home.title: Build from Scratch, Understand the Essence
home.subtitle: Truly understand how computer science infrastructure is built by constructing 8 core systems from the ground up

tiny-interpreter.name: Tiny Interpreter
tiny-interpreter.description: Build an interpreter from scratch to understand how code executes

simple-compiler.name: Simple Compiler
simple-compiler.description: Build a compiler to understand the translation from high-level language to machine code

mini-os.name: Mini OS
mini-os.description: Build a tiny OS to understand process and memory management

simple-fs.name: Simple FS
simple-fs.description: Build a file system to understand persistent data storage

storage-engine.name: Storage Engine
storage-engine.description: Build a storage engine to understand database internals

tx-manager.name: Tx Manager
tx-manager.description: Build a transaction manager to understand ACID and concurrency control

consensus.name: Consensus
consensus.description: Implement consensus algorithms to understand distributed consistency

dist-kv.name: Dist KV
dist-kv.description: Build a distributed key-value store to understand sharding and replication
